name: Beagle
description: The Beagle is a cheerful, curious, and loving breed known for its keen sense of smell and strong hunting instincts. Friendly and outgoing, Beagles make affectionate companions for families and children alike.

adaptability.description: Beagles adapt well to moderate climates but should be protected from extreme heat or prolonged cold exposure.

diet.title: DIET
diet.mainDescription: Beagles thrive on a balanced, nutrient-rich diet with moderate calories to maintain their ideal weight and support their active lifestyle.

tips.title: Watch portion sizes
tips.description: Beagles are prone to overeating. Measure meals carefully and avoid free-feeding to prevent obesity.

tips.title: Protein-rich meals
tips.description: Provide 18–25% protein from chicken, fish, or lamb to maintain energy and muscle tone.

tips.title: Fiber for digestion
tips.description: Include ingredients like sweet potato and beet pulp for digestive support and firm stools.

tips.title: Age-based nutrition
tips.description: Select formulas tailored for Beagle puppies, adults, or seniors for balanced growth and health.

training.title: BEAGLE TRAINING
training.mainDescription: Beagles are intelligent but independent thinkers. Patience, consistency, and positive rewards are essential to effective training.

tips.title: Leash & recall training
tips.description: Beagles follow scents easily—train recall early and keep them leashed during walks.

tips.title: Mental stimulation
tips.description: Engage Beagles with scent games, puzzle feeders, and obedience tasks to prevent boredom-driven behavior.

grooming.title: GROOMING
grooming.subtitle: Beagles have a short coat that’s easy to maintain. Regular cleaning and brushing keep them looking great and feeling fresh.
grooming.mainDescription: Beagles have a short, dense coat that requires minimal care but benefits from regular brushing and hygiene checks.

tips.title: Weekly brushing
tips.description: Brush once a week to remove dead hair and stimulate natural oils.

tips.title: Ear & dental hygiene
tips.description: Clean ears weekly to prevent infection and brush teeth 2–3 times per week.
